message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $120 to you, but I'm willing to let it go for $110. Let me know if this works for you!
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer! I'm interested in the product, but $110 is a bit high for me. Would you be willing to come down to $90?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. Considering your feedback, I'm willing to negotiate further. How about $95 for the product?
Thanks for coming down on the price, Alice.  To be honest,  $90 is really the most I can justify spending on this.  Would you be willing to meet me there?
